ai-mil7.6.10:1.1_0: “Venerable sir, what deficient in the carpet do you say?”
ai-mil7.6.10:1.2_0: “As though, great king, has many precious things, much as they buffalo, that he could not get enough to eat the corpse.
ai-mil7.6.10:1.3_0: In the same way, when a meditator is hanging on alms-food in the water, he’s alone withdrawn from the top, his rope, and the living in the water, he can carry his banner, soft and clean four-foods!
ai-mil7.6.10:1.4_0: This is the definition of a single town.
ai-mil7.6.10:1.5_0: The senior monk who has heard the statement of the Teacher:
ai-mil7.6.10:3.3_0: It’s enough for a resolute mendicant
ai-mil7.6.10:5.1_0: The fifth sub-chapter on Sīha is finished.
